name: Interactive Virtual Office
description:
Descrpition :

This is a demonstration of using unity3d for interactive Architectural Visualization, walk-through, real-time rendering, This can be also implemented in virtual reality.

Instruction:

It might take a while to load, so please wait while its done.

Use "Arrow" keys or "W-A-S-D" to move around.

Move mouse to Look around or Turn.

Note:

For android you can download our RD_Virtual Office_v1.0.apk and try it out in your android phone.
